result.title: Dissemination and Communication Report (M18)
result.description: This is the report to describe all the activities and actions carried out to implement the depicted plan in D8.1. It will include enough detail about the attended and organized events; the published papers, articles or news; the online (website, social networks, blogs) activity and statistics and the actions in collaboration with external entities. KPIs status and initial plan will be updated if required.

result.title: Demonstrator of Services Using Integrated CPP and Insurance Data
result.description: Demonstrator of Services Using Integrated CPP and Insurance Data. This deliverable covers the implemented industrial demonstrator of the smashHit in real operational environment of VW and LN including cross sectorial services. result.title: 2nd generation single vision lenses
result.description: 2nd generation single vision lenses diopter +6 and -6 lenses with 40 mm diameter, fitted to 6 test persons prescriptions. Prototype lenses are fabricated by UV lithography and lift-off process. The second generation lenses are adjusted in response to test persons feedback from first generation lenses (D8.1)

result.title: Legal requirements for the PIMCity platform and its components
result.description: It constitutes a mapping exercise of the legal requirements that are to form the foundation of the PIMCity platform, based on T7.2. It will be based on the GDPR and e-Privacy Directive/Regulation. Data protection and privacy elements that are likely to be challenging in light of the PIMCity project, will be identified. For example (i) Risks stemming from the large scale personal data processing for providing a privacy-preserving tool and trading personal data; (ii) The inevitable encounter with special categories of data; (iii) The presence of algorithms and automated- decision making; (iv) The transparency obligation in light of privacy policies and informed consent forms. This deliverable will be drafted simultaneously with D1.1 on the technical and user requirements specification. This way the project can build upon a comprehensive requirement definition from the outset, which should form the foundation for all further work carried out in light of the project.

project.title: PIMCITY: BUILDING THE NEXT GENERATION PERSONAL DATA PLATFORMS

result.title: Data management plan
result.description: The initial report on the PIMCity data management plan, following the FAIR Data Management guidelines and template published by the H2020 programme. It describes the data management life cycle for the data to be collected, processed and generated. A crucial part of D7.1 is the carrying out of data protection impact assessment in line with article 35 GDPR. A first version of the necessary documents will also be drawn up (privacy policy, informed consent forms for the beta-testers...) and added as annexes to the deliverable.
